job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Title: Software Engineer- Wallets team Location: Remote Duration: PERM Job Description: What you'll work on: Design and develop resilient and scalable solutions that receive, custody, and broadcast digital assets for millions of users across all major blockchain networks Work on critical, high-value software for the client crypto currency exchange Solve complex problems unique to the crypto currency space that use applied cryptography and strict security protocols Work with modern, state-of-the-art software development, including CI/CD, infrastructure as code, containers, and microservices architecture Work with a diverse set of languages and frameworks, including Java microservices, TypeScript, Python, a suite of AWS services, and various databases Mentor and train other engineers using your expertise in software development Be an integral member of an agile software engineering team using SCRUM methodology What you'll bring: 5+ years designing software and coding professionally Computer Science degree preferred An interest in the blockchain and cryptocurrency space Proficient with Java Proficient with a scripting language such as Python, Nodejs and/or PHP Comfortable and proficient in a Linux terminal is required Experience building and testing microservices with REST, preferably in Java Capable of taking a new feature from the software design stage, through the development process, and ship it to production Broad knowledge of SQL and relational database design Some knowledge of the mechanics of applied cryptography including hashing, randomization, public-key encryption, symmetric encryption, and elliptic curves An eye for detail Strong communication skills with the ability to explain complex problems and concepts to people of all levels of expertise A passion for learning and sharing what you learn Comfort and experience shifting gears quickly, learning on the fly, and working on an evolving product without having all of the answers
